# Create a simple HTML page with a title and basic content

## Description
Create a simple HTML page with a title and basic content

## Setup
1. Clone this repository
2. Open `index.html` in a web browser
3. No additional setup required

## Features
- Page has a title
- Page displays content
- Page is responsive
